title: Healthcare Practice Competency Enhancement: Humanized Learning Design Workshop for University Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design theories and language teaching experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can design a three-stage language lesson plan reflecting learner characteristics by applying humanized pedagogy.
Participants can revise educational materials through iterative design and feedback incorporation in a PBL environment.
Participants can systematically collect and incorporate feedback from peers and instructors using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
